item.title: Interview Questions
item.description: If you’re preparing for an interview (either as interviewee or interviewer), this is a good link to check out! It’s essentially a bot that returns common hiring questions for faculty appointments within computer science. Here you get a pdf with a good pool of questions for practicing.

item.title: 4 LaTeX
item.description: Handy links for LaTeX Detexify automatic recognition of handwritten symbols
